ygData.subject: Re: Mata's Comment on the Chain Letter
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I m glad it is only in your foolish view. ... From: Iggie/Alyssandra/Jane Pierson  To:  Sent: Tuesday,
ygData.messageBody:
Well I'm glad it is only in your foolish view.

----- Original Message -----
From: Iggie/Alyssandra/Jane Pierson <ldyiggie@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 7:15 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Mata's Comment on the Chain Letter


> From: "Iggie/Alyssandra/Jane Pierson" <ldyiggie@...>
>
> Actually Mata, you were almost as bad in my view because you re-posted the
> entire chain letter with your reply. I agree... chain mail has no place
on any
> maillist.
>
> Please trim the quoted material from your reply or send it just to the
person
> you're addressing.
>
> Thanks much!
>
> Iggie
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking to expand your world?
